DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Asia. The aim of this trial is to investigate pharmacokinetics of insulin detemir in healthy Taiwanese subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics of Insulin Detemir in Healthy Volunteers From Taiwan
DOC.criteria: Considered generally healthy upon completion of medical history and physical examination as judged by the investigator Body mass index (BMI) between 18 and 27 kg/m^2, inclusive Fasting plasma glucose maximum 6.1 mmol/l Nonsmoker or smoking maximum 5 cigarettes per day or the equivalent Participation in any other clinical trial involving other investigational products within the last 3 months Subject with a history of alcohol or drug dependence Subject with a firstdegree relative with diabetes mellitus
